New Records: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for the most 30-point games in NBA history (563)
Key Match Events: The Lakers improved to 20-14 record-wise with a 119-102 win over the Atlanta Hawks
LeBron James scored 30 points on 13-of-20 shooting and eight assists
Max Christie's emergence and a shift within the rotation to prioritize defensive-leaning players helped the Lakers correct their weakness and turn their season around
Pre-Game Insights: Coach JJ Redick emphasized the importance of details in the game plan and encouraged the team to strive for greatness
The Lakers made a trade on Dec. 29 to bolster their defensive versatility, size, and length by swapping D'Angelo Russell and Maxwell Lewis for Dorian Finney-Smith and Shake Milton
Post-Match Reflections: Coach JJ Redick expressed his encouragement and satisfaction with the team's recent surge and improvement on both sides of the ball
LeBron James said he was humbled to set the record and pass his childhood idol Michael Jordan
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers have won eight of 11 games and moved up to No. 4 in the West over the past month
The team has posted the league's 16th-best offense, fifth-best defense, and ninth-best net rating over their past 11 games
The Lakers will evaluate their roster over the next few weeks ahead of the Feb. 6 trade deadline and identify which positions and skill sets they will prioritize on the trade market
